title: Jumptopia Lite Holland Village at Klook
blurb: Enjoy bouncing fun at Jumptopia Lite Holland Village!
description: Jumptopia Lite Holland Village offers an exciting inflatable playground experience for children. This pop-up event features various bouncy castles and interactive play areas designed to promote active play and fun for kids of all ages. With a focus on safety and engagement, Jumptopia provides a stimulating environment where children can explore, jump, and create lasting memories. Parents can relax knowing their children are in a secure and entertaining space. Perfect for family outings and playdates, Jumptopia Lite Holland Village is a must-visit destination for endless fun and laughter. The event is designed to cater to children of various age groups, ensuring that everyone has a memorable and enjoyable experience. The vibrant and colorful inflatables create a visually appealing and exciting atmosphere that will captivate children's imaginations and encourage them to engage in active play. This is a great opportunity for families to bond and create lasting memories together.

title: Orchard - Sky Pass (10 sessions) - 1 hour play time
blurb: Enjoy 10 play sessions at Kiztopia Orchard!
description: Experience the thrill of Kiztopia Orchard with our Sky Pass, offering 10 sessions of 1-hour playtime. Perfect for families seeking fun and engaging activities, this pass allows children to explore our interactive play areas and develop their skills through play. Enjoy quality time with your kids in a safe and stimulating environment. This pass is ideal for regular visits, providing flexibility and value for families who love to play and learn together. Discover new adventures with each visit, creating lasting memories at Kiztopia Orchard.

title: Orchard - Annual Pass (Any Day)
blurb: Enjoy unlimited access to Kiztopia Orchard!
description: Unlock a year of fun with the Kiztopia Orchard Annual Pass! Enjoy unlimited access to our exciting play areas, designed to stimulate creativity and physical activity for children of all ages. This pass is perfect for families who want to make the most of their leisure time, providing endless opportunities for play and learning. Create unforgettable memories with your loved ones as you explore our interactive zones and participate in engaging activities. With the Annual Pass, the adventure never ends at Kiztopia Orchard.

title: Orchard - Sky Pass (10 sessions) - 1 hour play
blurb: Enjoy 10 sessions of 1-hour playtime at Orchard!
description: The Orchard Sky Pass offers ten 1-hour play sessions, providing an exciting and engaging experience for children. This pass allows access to Kiztopia's facilities, where kids can explore various play areas designed to stimulate their imagination and physical activity. It's an ideal option for families looking for a fun and flexible way to enjoy Kiztopia's offerings. Children can immerse themselves in a safe and interactive environment, fostering creativity and social skills through play. Parents can relax knowing their children are in a secure and entertaining setting, making it a perfect outing for the whole family. This pass is suitable for children of various ages, ensuring that everyone can find something to enjoy. The Orchard Sky Pass is a great way to make lasting memories and create fun-filled experiences.

title: Orchard - Sky Pass (10 sessions) - 2 hours play
blurb: Enjoy 10 play sessions at Kiztopia Orchard outlet!
description: The Orchard - Sky Pass offers 10 sessions of 2-hour playtime at Kiztopia's Orchard outlet, providing an engaging and active experience for children. This pass allows families to enjoy multiple visits, exploring various play areas and activities designed to promote physical activity and imaginative play. It's an excellent option for parents looking to provide their kids with a fun and stimulating environment. Children can climb, slide, and explore in a safe and supervised setting, fostering social interaction and creativity. This pass is perfect for families who want to make regular visits to Kiztopia Orchard, ensuring their children have access to a world of fun and learning. The pass includes access to all play areas within the outlet, allowing children to discover new adventures with each visit. It is inclusive of 9% GST.

title: Kiztopia Prestige - Single Entrance (2 hours play)
blurb: Enjoy 2 hours of playtime at Kiztopia Prestige!
description: Experience the ultimate indoor playground adventure at Kiztopia Prestige! This single entrance pass grants you two hours of playtime filled with fun and excitement. Explore various play zones designed to stimulate creativity and physical activity for children of all ages. Kiztopia is dedicated to providing a safe and engaging environment where kids can learn through play. With a wide range of activities, including climbing structures, interactive games, and role-playing areas, there's something for every child to enjoy. Parents can relax and unwind while their children explore and discover new adventures. Book your tickets now and create unforgettable memories with your family!

title: Kiztopia Prestige - Additional Adult Admission
blurb: Additional adult ticket for Kiztopia Prestige entry.
description: Enhance your family's Kiztopia Prestige experience with an additional adult ticket. This ticket allows an extra adult to join in the fun and supervise children within the playground. Kiztopia is committed to providing a safe and enjoyable environment for families, and having additional adults ensures that everyone can participate comfortably. Explore the various play zones together, from climbing structures to interactive games, and create lasting memories as a family. With this additional adult ticket, you can make the most of your visit to Kiztopia Prestige and enjoy quality time with your loved ones. Book your tickets now and embark on an unforgettable adventure!

blurb: Enjoy 10 admissions with 1-hour playtime each!

title: Kiztopia Prestige – 10x Admission (1 hour play time)
blurb: 10 admissions with 1 hour play time at Kiztopia

This package is perfect for families who visit frequently and want to save on individual admission costs. Each visit promises a fun-filled experience with a variety of play areas suitable for children of different ages. The package includes access to all main play areas, ensuring a diverse and engaging experience every time. Parents can relax knowing their children are playing in a safe and stimulating environment. This package offers great value for regular visitors, making it easier to plan fun outings without the hassle of purchasing individual tickets each time. It's an ideal way to make the most of Kiztopia's exciting attractions and create lasting memories with your family.

title: Kiztopia Prestige – Single Entrance (1 hours play)
blurb: Single entrance with 1 hour playtime at Kiztopia.
description: Enjoy one hour of playtime at Kiztopia with the Prestige single entrance pass. This pass grants access to all play areas within Kiztopia, allowing children to explore and engage in various activities designed to promote learning and fun. Kiztopia is an indoor playground suitable for children of all ages, offering a safe and stimulating environment for kids to develop their physical, cognitive, and social skills. Parents can join in the fun or relax in designated areas while their children play. This pass includes access to all attractions and play zones within the park, ensuring a memorable and enjoyable experience for the whole family. Kiztopia is dedicated to providing a clean and safe environment for all visitors.

title: Jumptopia

title: My Little 90’s Job Adventure
blurb: Step back in time with 90's job adventure!
description: Embark on a nostalgic journey with Kiztopia's My Little 90’s Job Adventure, an immersive experience designed for families and children. This unique event allows kids to explore various professions from the 1990s through interactive and engaging activities. Children can role-play as different professionals, fostering creativity and learning about the working world in a fun and stimulating environment. Parents can join in the adventure, reminiscing about the past while creating new memories with their children. My Little 90’s Job Adventure aims to provide an educational and entertaining experience, promoting imagination, teamwork, and an appreciation for different careers. With its diverse range of activities and nostalgic theme, this event promises an unforgettable experience for everyone involved, fostering creativity, physical activity, and social interaction in a safe and supervised setting.

title: Children’s Festival
blurb: Celebrate fun at the Children's Festival!
description: Join Kiztopia for the Children’s Festival, a vibrant and exciting event designed to celebrate the joy of childhood. This festival offers a wide range of engaging activities and entertainment for families and children of all ages. Kids can participate in interactive games, enjoy live performances, and explore various themed zones. Parents can join in the fun or relax while watching their children have a blast. The Children’s Festival aims to create a joyful and stimulating environment where children can learn, play, and make new friends. With its diverse range of activities and festive atmosphere, this event promises an unforgettable experience for everyone involved, fostering creativity, physical activity, and social interaction in a safe and supervised setting. It's a perfect opportunity to create lasting memories with your loved ones.

title: TriFactor Kids Run
blurb: Run, play, and have fun at TriFactor Kids Run!
description: Get active with Kiztopia's TriFactor Kids Run, an exciting event designed to promote health and fitness among children. This fun run offers various race categories suitable for different age groups and skill levels. Kids can participate in a friendly competition, challenge themselves, and enjoy the thrill of running. Parents can cheer on their children and join in the fun, making it a memorable family experience. The TriFactor Kids Run aims to encourage a healthy lifestyle, promote physical activity, and foster a sense of accomplishment among young participants. With its engaging race format and supportive environment, this event promises an unforgettable experience for everyone involved, fostering physical activity, and social interaction in a safe and supervised setting.
